column4: would you guys know a reason why I am randomly no longer able to log in?
I'm the only person who uses the computer and I've definitely got the right username and passwor.d
Normally the computer is connected to an external hard-drive, but is not right now, could that affect my logging in?
tat would set u to root
where are you not able to login??
hahaha, kind of a big detail I left out there
hmm well boot into recovery mode and add another user and try
i hope u know how to add
I'm always improving my cli skills, I use non-graphical SSH a hell of a lot
I figured out why I couldn't log in
